text.tspan: Dragging and Dropping
Let's drag a Document to the Clipboard.
You can do this with every Item in a List.
Add the Items you are currently working on
to the Clipboard to find them later.
Draggable Items
Every Item you can see in a List
or in the Clipboard you can drag.
If the Sidebar is open, the Clipboard
will be shown automatically.
Droppable Areas
You can drop thedraggable Item to every area
that has the pentagon background.
Drop Hover
While dragging an Item over a droppable area
it is marked active. You can drop it here and now.
Dropped Item
The Document "Passive" was dropped
to the Clipboard. You will now find it
faster and can use it in an association.
